forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. High around 55F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this evening, then becoming cloudy after midnight. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. High around 60F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 53F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers likely and possibly a thunderstorm in the morning, then some lingering showers still possible in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Thunderstorms in the morning followed by occasional showers in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 9C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 47F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 12C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 53F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with light rain early. Low around 10C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with light rain early. Low 49F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 13C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 56F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 11C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 51F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 14C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 57F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain ending overnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain ending early. Remaining cloudy. Low 48F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High around 55F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 47F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional light rain. High 13C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. High around 55F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low near 50F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Chance of a shower or two during the morning, followed by partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 14C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 57F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 48F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
